books.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians Series
books.subtitle: Written by Rick Riordan, this Fantasy novel series amazed me and inspired me a lot to write my own stories.

books.title: The Pressure's Off: There is a Better Way to Live
books.subtitle: By Larry Crabb, this book teaches you a lot about leaving your past actions and mistakes to God. p.s. I read the Portuguese version 'Chega de Regras'.

books.title: Mere Christianity
books.subtitle: By C.S. Lewis, this book is a great read for those who want to understand more about Christianity and its principles. ps. I'm still reading this one.

games.title: Hollow Knight
games.subtitle: An indie Metroidvania game developed by Team Cherry. This games makes you cry with its story. It features a vast interconnected world, challenging combat, and beautiful hand-drawn art.

games.title: Celeste
games.subtitle: A platformer game developed by Maddy Makes Games. This games teaches A LOT about perseverance. It tells the story of a girl named Madeline, who climbs a mountain while dealing with lots of dangerous adventures.

games.title: Terraria
games.subtitle: A sandbox adventure game developed by Re-Logic. This game is like a 2D version of Minecraft, but with dozens of bosses and creatures ready to one hit kill you.

games.title: Minecraft
games.subtitle: Pretty much most of the world know this game in some way. From the childrens game to its childhood favorite game. It gives you freedom to express your creativity through a peaceful blocky world.

games.title: PEAK
games.subtitle: This game is pure pain. But it's funny! You got to climb a mountain with your friends, who can help or kill you (most of times they will help, I think...).
